item.title: Terms & Conditions
item.dc:creator: sysadmin
item.content:encoded:
Terms & Conditions

By accepting, purchasing, signing or using the prepaid card issued by Transact24 Limited, you agree to be bound by the terms and conditions set forth herein, as they may be amended from time to time ("Terms and Conditions").it shall be your sole responsibility to keep yourself informed of the most up to date Terms and Conditions.

Definitions

Unless the context otherwise requires, the following expressions shall have the following meanings in these Terms and Conditions:

"Account" means each individual account maintained by the Company relating to the relevant Prepaid Card and identified by the card numbers as shown on the face of the Prepaid Card;

"Cardholder", "you" or "your" and any person who has purchased or used or will use the Prepaid Card for any Transaction; "Company", "we", "us" or "our" means Transact24 Limited

"CUP" means China UnionPay;

"Expiry Date" means the date falling 3 years after the purchase of the Prepaid Card;

"Foreign Currency Transaction" means any transaction in currencies other than the base currency of the Prepaid Card;

"Hong Kong" means the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of the People's Republic of China;

"HK$" means Hong Kong dollar, the lawful currency of Hong Kong;

"Prepaid Card" means a Transact24 Limited CUP prepaid card issued by the Company and designated with a Prepaid Value;

"Prepaid Value" means the amount credited to the Account upon issue of a Prepaid Card designated with such same amount;

"Transaction" means the transaction, for the purchase of goods and/or services effected by the use of the Prepaid Card.

Please note that all charges/fees/deductions set out below may, at our sole discretion from time to time, be adjusted without any prior notice. A schedule setting out the currently applicable fees/charges/deductions will be published on our website, www.t24cup.com ("Website"), from time to time.

The Prepaid Card

1. The base currency of the Prepaid Card is Hong Kong dollars. The maximum amounts of the Prepaid Value are HK$50,000, or in such amount which we may from time to time decide and specify in our Website or relevant promotional materials. The Prepaid Card is disposable, but not returnable, and/or refundable. The Prepaid Card is not transferable and any unused balance is not refundable. For details of the transfer of unused balance to a new Prepaid Card, please refer to paragraph 24 below.

2. We will maintain an Account for each Prepaid Card and each time you use the Prepaid Card for any Transaction or cash withdrawal (if applicable), we will deduct the relevant amount together with the applicable fees and charges (if any)from the Account (refer to fee schedule).

3. A HK$70 non-refundable card issuance fee per card is payable upon purchase of the Prepaid Card.

The use of the Prepaid Card

4. Before using the Prepaid Card, you must sign on the back of the Prepaid Card, where indicated. You may activate your Prepaid Card by calling the Hong Kong customer service hotline at (852) 8138 1388 or China Toll Free hotline at (86) 400 183 2666 or by visiting the Website at www.chinays.hk.

5. A 6-digit personal identification number ("PIN") is printed on the back of the Prepaid Card and is covered by silver scratch panel. If you find that the silver scratch panel is incomplete or otherwise appears to have been tampered with prior to activation, please return the card to us before activation, and we will issue a replacement card to you. No replacement card will be issued if the Prepaid Card has been activated. The PIN is required at the time you activate your Prepaid Card and each time you use the Prepaid Card for any Transaction or cash withdrawal. You are highly recommended to change the PIN for your own protection by calling the Hong Kong customer service hotline at (852) 8138 1388 or China Toll Free hotline at (86) 4001832666 or by visiting the Website at www.chinays.hk.

6. The Prepaid Card can only be used at those terminals/ merchants which accept CUP (applicable to CUP HK$ Prepaid Card) as a form of payment or at such other terminals which we may from time to time publish and for transactions which are authorised by us.

7. You must present the Prepaid Card and enter your 6-digit PIN at the time of payment for each Transaction, and sign the payment receipt with the same signature you signed on the back of the Prepaid Card. The Prepaid Card cannot be used for transactions where no payment receipt is signed such as for purchases through mail, telephone and internet orders or bill payments and any other transaction where the Prepaid Card is not required to be presented. The Prepaid Card cannot be used to process any payment where the payment amount exceeds the remaining balance of the Prepaid Value.

8. Once all of the balance of the Account has been deducted, the Prepaid Card is no longer valid.

9. The Prepaid Card cannot be used for any illegal or immoral activities, among other things, it legal gambling, money laundering and terrorist financing. We reserve the right to decline any Transaction that is considered, in our sole discretion, to be potentially suspicious, illegal or abnormal; for instance, any Transaction at the merchant categories, including but not limited to, Real Estate Sales, Real Estate Agent/Brokers, Automobile sales in rural areas, Automobile shops, Car and truck dealer sales/services/repairs parts/leasing, credit card repayments and Fines, or at such other merchants which we may from time to time publish.

Foreign Currency Transactions

10. The amount of each Foreign Currency Transaction will be converted into Hong Kong doll ars at a rate of exchange determined by reference to the exchange rate adopted by Transact24 on the date of conversion.

11. if the Foreign Currency Transaction is made using the Prepaid Card, a conversion charge equal to 1.5% of the amount of such transactions and other charge(s) as we may from time to time publish or specify in the Website or relevant promotional materials, together with the transaction levy which CUP may from time to time charge to us, will be deducted from the Account.

Available Balance Enquiry

12. No statement of the Account will be issued.

13. You can check the Prepaid Value remaining in the Account by calling our Hong Kong customer service hotline at (852) 8138 1388 or China Toll Free hotline on(86) 4001832666 or by visiting our Website at www.chinays.hk. No additional charges will be applied for this service. Alternatively, the remaining Prepaid Value in the Account can be checked at ATMs where a handling fee of HK$5 will be charged for each enquiry and this charge will be deducted from the Account.

14. No balance enquiry at ATMs will be available where the Prepaid Value in the Account falls below HKD$45.

15. You can check your transaction history without any additional charges by calling our Hong Kong customer service hotline at (852) 8138 1388 or China Toll Free hotline on (86) 4001832666 or by visiting our Website at www.chinays.hk.

Lost or Stolen Prepaid Card / Unauthorised Transactions / PIN forgotten

16. if the Prepaid Card is lost, stolen or has been used without the Cardholders authority, we will not refund any of the Prepaid Value in the Account to the Cardholder. We will not be liable for any loss to a Cardholder arising out of or in connection with the loss, theft or unauthorised use of the Prepaid Card or otherwise.

17. We will not reissue any PIN to the Cardholders in the event the Cardholders forget the PIN for the Prepaid Card.

Replacement Card

18. You shall report to us if, at any time before the Expiry Date, the Prepaid Card has malfunctioned. We may, at our sole discretion, replace the malfunctioned Prepaid Card with a new Prepaid Card with such remaining unused Prepaid Value in the Account for use until the Expiry Date, provided that the malfunctioned Prepaid Card is returned to us for cancellation. Replacement cards where the malfunction is not the fault of the Cardholder will be issued free of charge.

19. if the Prepaid Card is damaged due to misuse by you, we may at our sole discretion replace the Prepaid Card with a new Prepaid Card with such remaining unused Prepaid Value in the Account for use until the Expiry Date, provided that the damaged/ malfunctioned Prepaid Card is returned to us for cancellation. In such cases, a replacement fee of HK$50 will be automatically deducted from the Account.

20. For the protection of your Account, you may be asked to produce your proof of identification for the issue of a replacement Prepaid Card.

Account Management Fee

21. An account management fee of HK$8 per account per month will be charged. This fee shall be charged starting from the 13th month from the date of purchase and shall be deducted from the Account on the first calendar day of each month. In the event that the Prepaid Card has been replaced in accordance with paragraphs 19 or 20 above, the account management fee will be charged from the 13th month from the date the original Prepaid Card was purchased.

Expiry and Transfer

22. The Prepaid Card should be used before the Expiry Date.

23. Upon the Expiry Date, if there remains any unused Prepaid Value in the Account, you may, within three months from the Expiry Date, at our sole discretion, transfer the unused Prepaid Value in the Account to a new Account by purchasing a new Prepaid Card with a minimum Prepaid Value of HK$500. The aggregate Value of the expired Prepaid Card and the new Prepaid Card cannot exceed HK$50,000. The expired Prepaid Card shall be returned to us for cancellation. A handling fee of HK$50 will be charged and deducted from the new Account directly. For the protection of your Account, you may be asked to provide your proof of identification for such transfer request. Only one transfer is allowed for each Account and no accounts consolidation or accounts it wilI be allowed, subject to our final decision and judgment.

24. Refunds from any merchants can only be made to valid Prepaid Cards. We will not accept any merchant refunds to any expired or invalid Prepaid Cards.

25. Once the Expired Date has passed, the Prepaid Card can no longer be used and any unused Prepaid Value in the Account will not be refunded, and may only be transferred to a new Prepaid Card in accordance with paragraph 24 above.

Exclusion of Liability

26. The Company shall not be responsible for any refusal of a merchant to accept the Prepaid Card for payment in respect of any Transaction. Under no circumstances shall we be responsible for handling any disputes or any other matter in relation to any Transaction.

27. We will not be liable to you in respect of any losses or damages that you or any third party may suffer as a result of or in connection with or arising from the use of the Prepaid Card.

Termination

28. We may at any time terminate the use of the Prepaid Card and/or any services offered to you as set forth in these Terms and Conditions or to reject any Transaction without giving any prior notice or reason thereof. We shall not be liable for any losses or damages of whatsoever nature which you may suffer, directly or indirectly, as a result of such termination or rejection. Upon termination, the Prepaid Card shall be surrendered to us on demand.

Personal Data

29. You agree that you will provide accurate and complete personal information to the Company in connection with the Prepaid Card activation process. We will use the information you give us, as well as the information we receive from your use of the Prepaid Card, to facilitate your participation in any Prepaid Card service and for other purposes consistent with our Privacy Statement, which can be found at our Website www.chinays.hk.

Amendments

30. We may, at our sole discretion, amend any of these Terms and Conditions with immediate effect by publishing such amendments on our Website. We may from time to time publish all latest information relating to the Prepaid Card via our Website.

31. Retention or use of the Prepaid Card after such amendments become effective shall constitute your acceptance of such amendments irrespective of whether you have actual notice or knowledge thereof. All matters and disputes will be subject to our final decision.

Law and Jurisdiction

32. These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Hong Kong and the Cardholder hereby irrevocably submits to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Hong Kong.

General

33. If any of these Terms and Conditions is or becomes illegal, invalid or unenforceable in any respect, the remaining provisions hereof shall in no way be affected or impaired thereby.

34. These Terms and Conditions are written in both English and Chinese. If there is any inconsistency or conflict between the English and Chinese versions of these Terms and Conditions, the English version shall prevail.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: sysadmin
item.content:encoded:
Privacy Policy

Welcome to the T24 CUP Card Website (the "Site"). In this privacy policy ("Privacy Policy"), the expressions "we" and "us" means Transact24 Limited. “Terms of use” means the terms of use for prepaid card websites managed by Transact24 Limited.

Please read this privacy policy carefully. By viewing or using this site you agree that you have read and understood this privacy policy (as amended and posted on this site from time to time) and our terms of use which this privacy policy forms part. You may only use this site if you consent to the use of your personal data as set out in this privacy policy and if you agree to be bound by our terms of use and where relevant, the T24 CUP Card Terms and Conditions.

Collected information

We will collect personal information about you which you provide to us when using the Site, for example, when you activate your T24 CUP Card, log in to manage your T24 CUP Card, contact us through the Site, request information or otherwise provide personal information to us. Such information may include (but is not limited to) your T24 CUP card number, your full name, address, telephone number and email address.

You must ensure that the personal information you provide to us is accurate and complete.

Use of your personal information

We collect, use, store and otherwise process personal information about you for the following purposes: (i) to enable you to access and use the Site; (ii) to operate your T24 CUP Card account; (iii) to process your fund transfers and transactions; (iv) to enable us to provide any services which you have requested through use of the Site; (v) to personalise aspects of our overall service to you; (vi) to provide you with information regarding products and services that we feel may be of interest to you (see the "Marketing" section below).

Disclosing information

We will not disclose personal information obtained from you to any third parties other than required by; potential or actual legal proceedings, requirement to do so by governmental or law enforcement agency, or to our issuing banks, processors and third party partners as necessary to manage and process transactions.

Marketing

We and/or our partners will only use the personal information obtained from you to enable us to provide you with information by email, telephone or post regarding products and services that we feel may be of interest to you if you have provided your consent for us to do so by ticking the relevant box(es) on this website where your personal information is collected.

If you wish to withdraw consent for us to use this information at any time for either us and/or our partners', then you should inform us using the contact us function on our website.

We may need to disclose your personal information if you breach this Privacy Policy and/or our Terms of Use or in connection with legal proceedings or potential legal proceedings or if otherwise required to do so by law or any other governmental or law enforcement agency.

item.title: T24中国银联预付卡
item.dc:creator: sysadmin
item.content:encoded:
有了Transact24银联预付卡, 你可以方便快捷地在多达142个国家，超过 720万个有中国银联受理商标的商户/柜员机中提取现金和购物取現

了解更多 联系我们

预付卡特点

使用Transact24中国银联预付卡既简单又方便

  • 自动柜员机和商店

    在中国银联受理的自动柜员机和商店使用

  • 儲值高達50,000港元

    使用银行转账轻松管理单张卡和批量卡上截

  • 全球使用

    在全球超过142个中国银联受理的国家使用

  • 购物优惠

    在加入中国银联的商户中购物以享受优惠

介绍

T24预付卡为个人在国内和港澳携带及存取资金提供了一个更便捷的方式。港币币种的中国银联预付卡允许持卡人预先将资金转入到卡上。该预付卡也可以重新转入额外的资金并且任何未用完的资金都可以存储在卡内备用。连接到国内唯一银行专用网络——中国银联，预付卡可以在全球所有有银联标识的自动柜员机进行取款。而且该卡还可以在超过130万个有中国银联受理商标的商户享受购物

商务旅客

  •   预付“消费卡”
  •   可充值
  •   磁条

工资

  •   预付“消费卡”
  •   可充值
  •   磁条

学生

  •   预付“生活费卡”
  •   可充值
  •   磁条

旅游/退休人员

  •   预付“生活费卡”
  •   >可充值
  •   磁条

T24获准发行没刻名字的T24中国银联预付卡，每人最多可以申请两张卡

为什么选择中国银联

T24预付卡为个人在国内和港澳携带及存取资金提供了一个更便捷的方式。港币币种的中国银联预付卡允许持卡人预先充值资金到卡上。该预付卡也可以重新充值额外的资金并且任何未用完的资金都可以存储在卡内备用。连接到国内唯一银行专用网络——中国银联，T24预付卡可以在全球所有有银联标识的自动柜员机进行取款。而且该卡还可以在超过130万个有中国银联受理商标的商户享受购物

消费购物的便利性

  银联受理网络全球性，包括全球自动柜员机网络及快捷的POS机支付。

申请简易费用低

  申请是只需要提供身份证及地址证明即可

安全、舒心的购物体验

  基于密码验证使交易及账户更加安全，无论身处何方，你都可以随时安心购物。

遍及全球

  全球超过140个国家接受银联卡（见附件A），无论您在世界那一个角落，我们都可以把卡片送到您手上。

银行账户

  不需要银行账户

费用

该摘要显示你的主要费用及Transact24中国银联卡的限制
如需完整的详细信息，请阅读条款和条件

说明 货币（港元）
   申请费 100

Wanko

   以85折选购正价货品

   在特价时段以额外85折购买7折或以上货品

常见问题解答

这是我们收到T24中国银联卡持卡人最常问的问题汇总
如果没有找到您所要的答案，请与我们联系

   如何保证用卡安全？万一预付卡丢失了或被盗了怎么办？

每张预付卡都有一个唯一的PIN码。所有支付都经由安全通道进行。如丢卡或被盗时立即冻结卡内资金并替换该卡。损失只限于卡内剩余的金额

   我何时能收到我的预付卡？

港澳申请人士需2-3个工作日内收到。中国大陆申请人士需7-10个工作日即可收到。如果你不想在此时间段内签收您的预付卡，请致电我们的客服热线：+852 2851 0145

   我可以申请多张预付卡吗？

每用户只可申请2张Transact24中国银联卡

   预付卡有利息收入吗？

预付卡上的资金是没有利息收入的。

   预付卡有到期日吗？

有，Transact24中国银联卡有效期为3年。如果持卡人用卡频率较高，我们会提供换卡服务。有效日期印在卡片的正面。

   预付卡要保持一个最低余额吗？

不需要

   我的预付卡可以在境外/国外使用吗？

您可以在全球任何有中国银联商标的商户或柜员机上使用您的Transact24中国银联预付卡。请注意，中国银正处于迅速扩展，有某些柜员机或小店铺可能暂时未能接受银联支付。我们建议，例如在前往某餐馆前，提前咨询一下该商户是否接受银联支付或准备多一种支付方式以防万一。

item.title: T24中國銀聯預付卡
item.dc:creator: sysadmin
item.content:encoded:
有了Transact24銀聯預付卡, 你可以方便快捷地在多達142個國家，超過 720萬個有中國銀聯受理商標的商戶/櫃員機中經網上和親臨商店提取現金

了解更多 聯繫我們

預付卡特點

使用Transact24中國銀聯預付卡既簡單又方便

  • 自動櫃員機和商店和網上

    在中國銀聯受理的自動櫃員機和商店和網上使用

  • 儲值高達50,000港元

    使用銀行轉帳輕鬆管理單張卡和批量卡上截

  • 全球使用

    在全球超過142個中國銀聯受理的國家使用

  • 購物優惠

    在加入中國銀聯的商戶中購物以享受優惠

介紹

T24預付卡為個人在國內和港澳攜帶及存取資金提供了一個更便捷的方式。港幣幣種的中國銀聯預付卡允許持卡人預先增值資金到卡上。該預付卡也可以重新增值額外的資金並且任何未用完的資金都可以存儲在卡內備用。連接到國內唯一銀行私人網路絡——中國銀聯，預付卡可以在全球所有有銀聯標識的自動櫃員機進行取款。而且該卡還可以在超過130萬個有中國銀聯受理商標的商戶享受購物

商務旅客

  •   預付“消費卡”
  •   可增值
  •   磁條

工資

  •   預付“消費卡
  •   可增值
  •   磁條

學生

  •   預付“生活費卡”
  •   可增值
  •   磁條

旅遊/退休人員

  •   預付“生活費卡”
  •   可增值
  •   磁條

T24獲准發行沒刻名字的T24中國銀聯預付卡，每人最多可以申請兩張卡

為什麼選擇中國銀聯

T24預付卡為個人在國內和港澳攜帶及存取資金提供了一個更便捷的方式。港幣幣種的中國銀聯預付卡允許持卡人預先將資金轉到卡上。該預付卡也可以重新轉入額外的資金並且任何未用完的資金都可以存儲在卡內備用。連接到國內唯一銀行私人網絡——中國銀聯，T24預付卡可以在全球所有有銀聯標識的自動櫃員機進行取款。而且該卡還可以在超過130萬個有中國銀聯受理商標的商戶享受購物

消費購物的便利性

  銀聯受理網路全球性，包括全球自動櫃員機網路及快捷的POS機支付。

申請簡易費用低

  申請是只需要提供身份證及地址證明即可

安全、舒心的購物體驗

  基於密碼驗證使交易及帳戶更加安全，讓你無論何時何地都能安心購物。

遍及全球

  全球超過140個國家接受銀聯卡（見附件A），無論您在世界那一個角落，我們都可以把卡片送到您手上。

銀行帳戶

  不需要銀行帳戶

費用

該摘要顯示你的主要費用及Transact24中國銀聯卡的限制
如需完整的詳細信息，請閱讀條款和條件

說明 貨幣（港元）

   開設費 免費
   年費 無
   報失補卡處理 50/張
   外幣交易滙率費用 1.50%
   自動櫃員機提款手續費 45
   賬戶管理費 5/月（從第13個月開始收取的新方案）
   查詢可用餘額
   a. 经网上户口查询 免费
   b. 经电话热线查询 免费
   c. 经有银联标识的自动柜员机查询 每一次5元
   再充值处理费 总金额的1％,充值额最少10元

購物優惠

銀聯卡持有人有機會獲得遍及香港，澳門，來自180多個不同商戶和超過2500間購物商店的獨家優惠

常見問題解答

這是我們收到T24中國銀聯卡持卡人最常問的問題匯總
如果沒有找到您所要的答案，請與我們聯繫

   如何保證用卡安全？萬一預付卡丟失了或被盜了怎麼辦？

每張預付卡都有一個唯一的PIN碼。所有支付都經由秘密頻道進行。如丟卡或被盜時立即凍結卡內資金並替換該卡。損失只限於卡內剩餘的金額

   我何時能收到我的預付卡？

港澳申請人士需2-3個工作日內收到。中國大陸申請人士需7-10個工作日即可收到。如果你不想在此時間段內簽收您的預付卡，請致電我們的客服熱線：+852 2851 0145

   我可以申請多張預付卡嗎？

每用戶只可申請2張Transact24中國銀聯卡

   預付卡有利息收入嗎？

預付卡上的資金是沒有利息收入的。

   預付卡有到期日嗎？

有，Transact24中國銀聯卡有效期為3年。如果持卡人用卡頻率較高，我們會提供換卡服務。有效日期印在卡片的正面。

   預付卡要保持一個最低餘額嗎？

不需要

   我的預付卡可以在境外/國外使用嗎？

您可以在全球任何有中國銀聯商標的商戶或櫃員機上使用您的Transact24中國銀聯預付卡。請注意，中國銀正處於迅速擴展，有某些櫃員機或小店鋪可能暫時未能接受銀聯支付。我們建議，例如在前往某餐館前，提前諮詢一下該商戶是否接受銀聯支付或準備多一種支付方式以防萬一。

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: T24中國銀聯預付卡 | T24中國銀聯卡
有了Transact24銀聯預付卡, 你可以方便快捷地在多達142個國家，超過720萬個有中國銀聯受理商標的商戶/櫃員機中經網上和親臨商店提取現金

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: sysadmin
item.content:encoded:
Privacy Policy

Welcome to the T24 CUP Card Website (the "Site"). In this privacy policy ("Privacy Policy"), the expressions "we" and "us" means Transact24 Limited. “Terms of use” means the terms of use for prepaid card websites managed by Transact24 Limited.

Please read this privacy policy carefully. By viewing or using this site you agree that you have read and understood this privacy policy (as amended and posted on this site from time to time) and our terms of use which this privacy policy forms part. You may only use this site if you consent to the use of your personal data as set out in this privacy policy and if you agree to be bound by our terms of use and where relevant, the T24 CUP Card Terms and Conditions.

Collected information

We will collect personal information about you which you provide to us when using the Site, for example, when you activate your T24 CUP Card, log in to manage your T24 CUP Card, contact us through the Site, request information or otherwise provide personal information to us. Such information may include (but is not limited to) your T24 CUP card number, your full name, address, telephone number and email address.

You must ensure that the personal information you provide to us is accurate and complete.

Use of your personal information

We collect, use, store and otherwise process personal information about you for the following purposes: (i) to enable you to access and use the Site; (ii) to operate your T24 CUP Card account; (iii) to process your fund transfers and transactions; (iv) to enable us to provide any services which you have requested through use of the Site; (v) to personalise aspects of our overall service to you; (vi) to provide you with information regarding products and services that we feel may be of interest to you (see the "Marketing" section below).

Disclosing information

We will not disclose personal information obtained from you to any third parties other than required by; potential or actual legal proceedings, requirement to do so by governmental or law enforcement agency, or to our issuing banks, processors and third party partners as necessary to manage and process transactions.

Marketing

We and/or our partners will only use the personal information obtained from you to enable us to provide you with information by email, telephone or post regarding products and services that we feel may be of interest to you if you have provided your consent for us to do so by ticking the relevant box(es) on this website where your personal information is collected.

If you wish to withdraw consent for us to use this information at any time for either us and/or our partners', then you should inform us using the contact us function on our website.

We may need to disclose your personal information if you breach this Privacy Policy and/or our Terms of Use or in connection with legal proceedings or potential legal proceedings or if otherwise required to do so by law or any other governmental or law enforcement agency.

We collect, use, store and otherwise process personal information about you for the following purposes: (i) to enable you to access and use the Site; (ii) to operate your T24 CUP Card account; (iii) to process your fund transfers and transactions; (iv) to enable us to provide any services which you have requested through use of the Site; (v) to personalise aspects of our overall service to you; (vi) to provide you with information regarding products and services that we feel may be of interest to you (see the "Marketing" section below).

Disclosing information

We will not disclose personal information obtained from you to any third parties other than required by; potential or actual legal proceedings, requirement to do so by governmental or law enforcement agency, or to our issuing banks, processors and third party partners as necessary to manage and process transactions.

Marketing

We and/or our partners will only use the personal information obtained from you to enable us to provide you with information by email, telephone or post regarding products and services that we feel may be of interest to you if you have provided your consent for us to do so by ticking the relevant box(es) on this website where your personal information is collected.

If you wish to withdraw consent for us to use this information at any time for either us and/or our partners', then you should inform us using the contact us function on our website.

We may need to disclose your personal information if you breach this Privacy Policy and/or our Terms of Use or in connection with legal proceedings or potential legal proceedings or if otherwise required to do so by law or any other governmental or law enforcement agency.

item.title: Terms & Conditions
item.dc:creator: sysadmin
item.content:encoded:
Terms & Conditions

By accepting, purchasing, signing or using the prepaid card issued by Transact24 Limited, you agree to be bound by the terms and conditions set forth herein, as they may be amended from time to time ("Terms and Conditions").it shall be your sole responsibility to keep yourself informed of the most up to date Terms and Conditions.

Definitions

Unless the context otherwise requires, the following expressions shall have the following meanings in these Terms and Conditions:

"Account" means each individual account maintained by the Company relating to the relevant Prepaid Card and identified by the card numbers as shown on the face of the Prepaid Card;

"Cardholder", "you" or "your" and any person who has purchased or used or will use the Prepaid Card for any Transaction; "Company", "we", "us" or "our" means Transact24 Limited

"CUP" means China UnionPay;

"Expiry Date" means the date falling 3 years after the purchase of the Prepaid Card;

"Foreign Currency Transaction" means any transaction in currencies other than the base currency of the Prepaid Card;

"Hong Kong" means the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of the People's Republic of China;

"HK$" means Hong Kong dollar, the lawful currency of Hong Kong;

"Prepaid Card" means a Transact24 Limited CUP prepaid card issued by the Company and designated with a Prepaid Value;

"Prepaid Value" means the amount credited to the Account upon issue of a Prepaid Card designated with such same amount;

"Transaction" means the transaction, for the purchase of goods and/or services effected by the use of the Prepaid Card.

Please note that all charges/fees/deductions set out below may, at our sole discretion from time to time, be adjusted without any prior notice. A schedule setting out the currently applicable fees/charges/deductions will be published on our website, www.t24cup.com ("Website"), from time to time.

The Prepaid Card

1. The base currency of the Prepaid Card is Hong Kong dollars. The maximum amounts of the Prepaid Value are HK$50,000, or in such amount which we may from time to time decide and specify in our Website or relevant promotional materials. The Prepaid Card is disposable, but not returnable, and/or refundable. The Prepaid Card is not transferable and any unused balance is not refundable. For details of the transfer of unused balance to a new Prepaid Card, please refer to paragraph 24 below.

2. We will maintain an Account for each Prepaid Card and each time you use the Prepaid Card for any Transaction or cash withdrawal (if applicable), we will deduct the relevant amount together with the applicable fees and charges (if any)from the Account (refer to fee schedule).

3. A HK$70 non-refundable card issuance fee per card is payable upon purchase of the Prepaid Card.

The use of the Prepaid Card

4. Before using the Prepaid Card, you must sign on the back of the Prepaid Card, where indicated. You may activate your Prepaid Card by calling the Hong Kong customer service hotline at (852) 8138 1388 or China Toll Free hotline at (86) 400 183 2666 or by visiting the Website at www.chinays.hk.

5. A 6-digit personal identification number ("PIN") is printed on the back of the Prepaid Card and is covered by silver scratch panel. If you find that the silver scratch panel is incomplete or otherwise appears to have been tampered with prior to activation, please return the card to us before activation, and we will issue a replacement card to you. No replacement card will be issued if the Prepaid Card has been activated. The PIN is required at the time you activate your Prepaid Card and each time you use the Prepaid Card for any Transaction or cash withdrawal. You are highly recommended to change the PIN for your own protection by calling the Hong Kong customer service hotline at (852) 8138 1388 or China Toll Free hotline at (86) 4001832666 or by visiting the Website at www.chinays.hk.

6. The Prepaid Card can only be used at those terminals/ merchants which accept CUP (applicable to CUP HK$ Prepaid Card) as a form of payment or at such other terminals which we may from time to time publish and for transactions which are authorised by us.

7. You must present the Prepaid Card and enter your 6-digit PIN at the time of payment for each Transaction, and sign the payment receipt with the same signature you signed on the back of the Prepaid Card. The Prepaid Card cannot be used for transactions where no payment receipt is signed such as for purchases through mail, telephone and internet orders or bill payments and any other transaction where the Prepaid Card is not required to be presented. The Prepaid Card cannot be used to process any payment where the payment amount exceeds the remaining balance of the Prepaid Value.

8. Once all of the balance of the Account has been deducted, the Prepaid Card is no longer valid.

9. The Prepaid Card cannot be used for any illegal or immoral activities, among other things, it legal gambling, money laundering and terrorist financing. We reserve the right to decline any Transaction that is considered, in our sole discretion, to be potentially suspicious, illegal or abnormal; for instance, any Transaction at the merchant categories, including but not limited to, Real Estate Sales, Real Estate Agent/Brokers, Automobile sales in rural areas, Automobile shops, Car and truck dealer sales/services/repairs parts/leasing, credit card repayments and Fines, or at such other merchants which we may from time to time publish.

Foreign Currency Transactions

10. The amount of each Foreign Currency Transaction will be converted into Hong Kong doll ars at a rate of exchange determined by reference to the exchange rate adopted by Transact24 on the date of conversion.

11. if the Foreign Currency Transaction is made using the Prepaid Card, a conversion charge equal to 1.5% of the amount of such transactions and other charge(s) as we may from time to time publish or specify in the Website or relevant promotional materials, together with the transaction levy which CUP may from time to time charge to us, will be deducted from the Account.

Available Balance Enquiry

12. No statement of the Account will be issued.

13. You can check the Prepaid Value remaining in the Account by calling our Hong Kong customer service hotline at (852) 8138 1388 or China Toll Free hotline on(86) 4001832666 or by visiting our Website at www.chinays.hk. No additional charges will be applied for this service. Alternatively, the remaining Prepaid Value in the Account can be checked at ATMs where a handling fee of HK$5 will be charged for each enquiry and this charge will be deducted from the Account.

14. No balance enquiry at ATMs will be available where the Prepaid Value in the Account falls below HKD$45.

15. You can check your transaction history without any additional charges by calling our Hong Kong customer service hotline at (852) 8138 1388 or China Toll Free hotline on (86) 4001832666 or by visiting our Website at www.chinays.hk.

Lost or Stolen Prepaid Card / Unauthorised Transactions / PIN forgotten

16. if the Prepaid Card is lost, stolen or has been used without the Cardholders authority, we will not refund any of the Prepaid Value in the Account to the Cardholder. We will not be liable for any loss to a Cardholder arising out of or in connection with the loss, theft or unauthorised use of the Prepaid Card or otherwise.

17. We will not reissue any PIN to the Cardholders in the event the Cardholders forget the PIN for the Prepaid Card.

Replacement Card

18. You shall report to us if, at any time before the Expiry Date, the Prepaid Card has malfunctioned. We may, at our sole discretion, replace the malfunctioned Prepaid Card with a new Prepaid Card with such remaining unused Prepaid Value in the Account for use until the Expiry Date, provided that the malfunctioned Prepaid Card is returned to us for cancellation. Replacement cards where the malfunction is not the fault of the Cardholder will be issued free of charge.

19. if the Prepaid Card is damaged due to misuse by you, we may at our sole discretion replace the Prepaid Card with a new Prepaid Card with such remaining unused Prepaid Value in the Account for use until the Expiry Date, provided that the damaged/ malfunctioned Prepaid Card is returned to us for cancellation. In such cases, a replacement fee of HK$50 will be automatically deducted from the Account.

20. For the protection of your Account, you may be asked to produce your proof of identification for the issue of a replacement Prepaid Card.

Account Management Fee

21. An account management fee of HK$8 per account per month will be charged. This fee shall be charged starting from the 13th month from the date of purchase and shall be deducted from the Account on the first calendar day of each month. In the event that the Prepaid Card has been replaced in accordance with paragraphs 19 or 20 above, the account management fee will be charged from the 13th month from the date the original Prepaid Card was purchased.

Expiry and Transfer

22. The Prepaid Card should be used before the Expiry Date.

23. Upon the Expiry Date, if there remains any unused Prepaid Value in the Account, you may, within three months from the Expiry Date, at our sole discretion, transfer the unused Prepaid Value in the Account to a new Account by purchasing a new Prepaid Card with a minimum Prepaid Value of HK$500. The aggregate Value of the expired Prepaid Card and the new Prepaid Card cannot exceed HK$50,000. The expired Prepaid Card shall be returned to us for cancellation. A handling fee of HK$50 will be charged and deducted from the new Account directly. For the protection of your Account, you may be asked to provide your proof of identification for such transfer request. Only one transfer is allowed for each Account and no accounts consolidation or accounts it wilI be allowed, subject to our final decision and judgment.

24. Refunds from any merchants can only be made to valid Prepaid Cards. We will not accept any merchant refunds to any expired or invalid Prepaid Cards.

25. Once the Expired Date has passed, the Prepaid Card can no longer be used and any unused Prepaid Value in the Account will not be refunded, and may only be transferred to a new Prepaid Card in accordance with paragraph 24 above.

Exclusion of Liability

26. The Company shall not be responsible for any refusal of a merchant to accept the Prepaid Card for payment in respect of any Transaction. Under no circumstances shall we be responsible for handling any disputes or any other matter in relation to any Transaction.

27. We will not be liable to you in respect of any losses or damages that you or any third party may suffer as a result of or in connection with or arising from the use of the Prepaid Card.

Termination

28. We may at any time terminate the use of the Prepaid Card and/or any services offered to you as set forth in these Terms and Conditions or to reject any Transaction without giving any prior notice or reason thereof. We shall not be liable for any losses or damages of whatsoever nature which you may suffer, directly or indirectly, as a result of such termination or rejection. Upon termination, the Prepaid Card shall be surrendered to us on demand.

Personal Data

29. You agree that you will provide accurate and complete personal information to the Company in connection with the Prepaid Card activation process. We will use the information you give us, as well as the information we receive from your use of the Prepaid Card, to facilitate your participation in any Prepaid Card service and for other purposes consistent with our Privacy Statement, which can be found at our Website www.chinays.hk.

Amendments

30. We may, at our sole discretion, amend any of these Terms and Conditions with immediate effect by publishing such amendments on our Website. We may from time to time publish all latest information relating to the Prepaid Card via our Website.

31. Retention or use of the Prepaid Card after such amendments become effective shall constitute your acceptance of such amendments irrespective of whether you have actual notice or knowledge thereof. All matters and disputes will be subject to our final decision.

Law and Jurisdiction

32. These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Hong Kong and the Cardholder hereby irrevocably submits to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Hong Kong.

General

33. If any of these Terms and Conditions is or becomes illegal, invalid or unenforceable in any respect, the remaining provisions hereof shall in no way be affected or impaired thereby.

34. These Terms and Conditions are written in both English and Chinese. If there is any inconsistency or conflict between the English and Chinese versions of these Terms and Conditions, the English version shall prevail.
